multiplechoiceresponse.p: In Trainingland, select a facility level organisation unit, the COVID-19 Surveillance (Aggregate) data set and a period of your choice in the Data Entry app. Enter some test data into the data entry form and run validation. If the test data doesn’t pass validation, use the information to update the data values.

label.h3: When the form successfully passes validation, what does the validation result say?

choicegroup.choice: “Success! All data values have passed the validation check”
“The data entry screen successfully passed validation

div.p: When a data set successfully passes validation, the validation result says, “The data entry screen successfully passed validation”.
